job.title: Senior Full Stack Software Engineer.
job.description: Ethicon part of Johnson amp Johnson Medical Devices Companies is recruiting for a Senior Full Stack Software Engineer located in Seattle WAbrbrJohnson amp Johnson Medical Devices is focused on shaping the future of digital surgery and expanding its robotics and digital solutions offerings across the entire portfolio with multispecialty endtoend solutions in orthopedics endoluminal intervention and general surgery This includes the MONARCH platform a firstofitskind robotic technology indicated for bronchoscopic visualization of and access to patient airways for diagnostic and therapeutic procedures in the lungbrbrEthicon part of Johnson amp Johnson Medical Devices Companies has made significant contributions to surgery for more than 100 years from creating the first sutures to revolutionizing surgery with minimally invasive procedures Our continuing dedication to Shape the Future of Surgery is built on our commitment to help address the worlds most pressing health care issues and improve and save more lives Through Ethicons surgical technologies and solutions including sutures staplers energy devices trocars and hemostats and our commitment to treat serious medical conditions like obesity worldwide we deliver innovation to make a lifechanging impact For more information visit wwwethiconcombrbrWhy This MattersbrbrThis is the best opportunity for a Senior Full Stack Software Engineer to positively impact the trajectory of human healthbrbrYou will be responsible for a critical part of CSATS and your work will have a direct impact on patient outcomes CSATS measures technical skills in healthcare practitioners skills that directly impact clinical outcomes poor performers generate 3x more complications and 5x more deaths than top performers Our system generates 10 times the amount of information about an individuals skills in 110th the time of traditional peer review Major medical centers have completed 15 million assessments with CSATS and they depend on our system to ensure the quality of their practitioners and the safety of their patientsbrbrJohnson amp Johnson is an Affirmative Action and Equal Opportunity Employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender identity age national origin or protected veteran status and will not be discriminated against on the basis of disabilitybrbrstrongQualificationsbrbrstrongRequired Qualificationsbrul liBachelors degree in Computer Science or a related fieldli li3 years of industry software engineering experience in backend or API developmentli li3 years of industry experience with web technologies including JavaScriptli liStrong sense of responsibility for the happiness of customers and coworkersli brbrulstrongPreferred Qualificationsbrstrongul liMasters degree in Computer Science or a related fieldli liExperience with single page application React Angular Vue etcli liWellrounded experience with many programming languages platforms protocolsRFCsli liExperience with many data storage systems such as relationalSQL NoSQL columnar store graph databasesli liExperience with cloud computing especially Amazon Web Servicesli liStrong familiarity with command line and FreeLibreOpen Source Softwareli liStrong familiarity with Linuxbased operating systems especially Ubuntu GNULinux and Androidli liReal passion for learning and mastering new technologies quickly especially the technologies we use httpsdocsgooglecompresentationd19XL0ZwMNC0kfG52IEepwVwtiaY4zvBornGugLOTsztYeditli
